com.here.android.mpa.routing

Class RouteOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.routing.RouteOptions

  • public final class RouteOptions
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the definition of the RouteOptions class. The class contains options for route calculation.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  RouteOptions.HazardousGoodType
      Defines names for different types of hazardous goods that can be transported by a truck.
      static class  RouteOptions.PublicTransportLinkFlag
      Public Transport Link Flag.
      static class  RouteOptions.TimeType
      Ways that the time can be specified.
      static class  RouteOptions.TransportMode
      Represents values describing different mode of transportation a person will be using.
      static class  RouteOptions.TunnelCategory
      Specify the ADR tunnel category to restrict the truck route to.
      static class  RouteOptions.Type
      Represents different types of routing, such as by speed or by distance.

    • Method Detail

      • setPublicTransportTypeAllowed

        public RouteOptions setPublicTransportTypeAllowed(TransitType type,
                                         boolean allow)
        Sets whether a Public Transport Type is allowed. By default all types are allowed.
        Parameters:
        type - public transport type, see TransitType for valid values.
        allow - a boolean to allow/disallow a transit type
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.

      • isPublicTransportTypeAllowed

        public boolean isPublicTransportTypeAllowed(TransitType type)
        Checks whether a Public Transport type is allowed.
        Parameters:
        type - One of the public transport TransitType values to check if it is allowed.
        Returns:
        true if allowed, otherwise false.

      • setPublicTransportLinkFlag

        public RouteOptions setPublicTransportLinkFlag(RouteOptions.PublicTransportLinkFlag flag,
                                      boolean value)
        Sets the given Public Transport Link Flag.
        Parameters:
        flag - one of RouteOptions.PublicTransportLinkFlag
        value - true if set, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.

      • getPublicTransportLinkFlag

        public boolean getPublicTransportLinkFlag(RouteOptions.PublicTransportLinkFlag flag)
        Gets the given Public Transport Link Flag.
        Parameters:
        flag - one of RouteOptions.PublicTransportLinkFlag
        Returns:
        true if set, otherwise false.

      • isCarpoolAllowed

        public boolean isCarpoolAllowed()
        Check if usage of HOV/Carpool roads is allowed.
        Returns:
        true if allowed, otherwise false.

      • setCarpoolAllowed

        public RouteOptions setCarpoolAllowed(boolean value)
        Allow or disallow usage of HOV/Carpool roads.
        Parameters:
        value - Use true if allowed, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.
        Note:
        HOV (High Occupancy Vehicle)/Carpool road usage is disabled by default.

      • setTransitMinimumChangeTime

        public RouteOptions setTransitMinimumChangeTime(int minutes)
        Sets transit minimum change time. Any connection time below this value will be bumped up to the minimum. The default is zero.
        Parameters:
        minutes - time in minutes
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.

      • getTransitMinimumChangeTime

        public int getTransitMinimumChangeTime()
        Gets transit minimum change time. Any connection time below this value will be bumped up to the minimum. The default is zero.
        Returns:
        time in minutes

      • setTransitMaximumChanges

        public RouteOptions setTransitMaximumChanges(int changes)
        Sets the maximum number of vehicle changes allowed during the trip.
        Parameters:
        changes - number of vehicle changes
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.

      • getTransitMaximumChanges

        public int getTransitMaximumChanges()
        Gets the maximum number of vehicle changes allowed during the trip.
        Returns:
        number of vehicle changes

      • setTransitWalkTimeMultiplier

        public RouteOptions setTransitWalkTimeMultiplier(float value)
        Sets a multiplier to use for walking times. A higher number means a slower walking speed. The default is 1.0.
        Parameters:
        value - multiplier
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.

      • getTransitWalkTimeMultiplier

        public float getTransitWalkTimeMultiplier()
        Gets a multiplier to use for walking times. A higher number means a slower walking speed. The default is 1.0.
        Returns:
        multiplier

      • setTime

        public RouteOptions setTime(java.util.Date time,
                   RouteOptions.TimeType type)
        Sets the arrival or departure time.
        Parameters:
        time - The time to set.
        type - The type of time to set.
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Using a time type of ARRIVAL will result in this exception to be thrown as it is currently unsupported.

      • getTime

        public RouteOptions.TimeType getTime(java.util.Date date)
        Gets the arrival or departure time that has been set.
        Parameters:
        date - Output parameter where the date will be set. This may be null if the caller is only interested in the RouteOptions.TimeType.
        Returns:
        The TimeType of the parameter upon completion.

      • getRouteCount

        public int getRouteCount()
        Gets the current desired number of route
        Returns:
        current desired number of route

      • setRouteCount

        public RouteOptions setRouteCount(int count)
        Sets the desired number of route.

        Values greater than 10 are ignored if RouteOptions.TransportMode is set to public transport and online timetables are enabled.

        Parameters:
        count - route count
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.

      • setStartDirection

        public RouteOptions setStartDirection(int dirInDegrees)
        Start direction. The direction routing should start. Used for example not to route against one way streets. The direction is disregarded, if RouteOptions.TransportMode is pedestrian. Use values between 0-359. If greater value than 359 is specified, modulo of 360 is used.
        Parameters:
        dirInDegrees - Start direction in degrees. 0 is north, increases clockwise (ie. 90 is east).
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.

      • getStartDirection

        public int getStartDirection()
        Returns the start direction.
        Returns:
        The start direction in degrees. Value is between 0-359.

      • setTruckHasTrailer

        public RouteOptions setTruckHasTrailer(boolean value)
        Specifies that the truck has a trailer. Applicable to truck routing only.
        Parameters:
        value - If true, the truck has a trailer attached.
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.

      • doesTruckHasTrailer

        public boolean doesTruckHasTrailer()
        Gets the truck has a trailer option. Applicable to truck routing only.
        Returns:
        true if the truck has a trailer, false otherwise.

      • setTruckShippedHazardousGoods

        public RouteOptions setTruckShippedHazardousGoods(java.util.EnumSet<RouteOptions.HazardousGoodType> value)
        Sets the list of hazardous goods transported in the truck. Applicable to truck routing only.
        Parameters:
        value - Set of RouteOptions.HazardousGoodTypes transported by the truck.
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if value is null.

      • getTruckShippedHazardousGoods

        public java.util.EnumSet<RouteOptions.HazardousGoodType> getTruckShippedHazardousGoods()
        Gets the list of hazardous goods transported in the truck. Applicable to truck routing only.
        Returns:
        Set of RouteOptions.HazardousGoodTypes transported by the truck.

      • setTruckPermittedGrossWeight

        public RouteOptions setTruckPermittedGrossWeight(float value)
        Sets the permitted truck gross weight in metric tons. Applicable to truck routing only.
        Parameters:
        value - The permitted truck gross weight in metric tons. A value of Float#NaN will unset this option.
        Returns:
        The modified RouteOptions itself.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if weight is not greater than zero.

      • getTruckPermittedGrossWeight

        public float getTruckPermittedGrossWeight()
        Gets the permitted truck gross weight in metric tons. Applicable to truck routing only.
        Returns:
        The permitted truck gross weight in metric tons (Float.NaN if undefined).

        The modified RouteOptions itself.
